++Kundalini

Through tantric and taoist techniques it is possible to raise the kundalini.

Once raised, the person initially needs frequent sexual intercourse with energy sharing. If not done with someone who can raise their kundalini, they can drain their partner to death.

It takes about eight weeks to bring the frequency down to once per day, and another month before the person can be considered to have mastered it. [[Ra'anor][Raanor]] is one of the teachers, as are [Korum], [Danny] and [Nalini].

Korum taught Nalini, she taught Danny, and the pair taught [Saodat]
